title: Best of the Program | Guest: Jack Carr | 5/4/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the fearmongering the Left is doing in the wake of Roe v. Wade possibly being overturned. Glenn and Stu discuss the Left falling apart at Elon Musk buying Twitter. Author Jack Carr joins to discuss the ongoing Russia/Ukraine controversy and how it could play out.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
